sql-script.name: app
sql-script.tran-sql:
it_ad
CREATE TABLE `it_ad` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `adType` tinyint(4) NOT NULL, `src` varchar(256) , `url` varchar(128) , `content` text , `status` tinyint(4) default 0, `ad` tinyint(4) default 0, `days` tinyint(4) default 0, `startDate` date NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) )
